title: Quickstart Guide
description: Get up and running with Akira Docs in minutes
author: Akira Team

blocks.content: Follow these steps to start using Akira Docs for your documentation needs.

git clone https://github.com/your-org/akira-docs-template
cd akira-docs-template
npm install
npm run dev
Make sure you have Node.js 16 or higher installed on your system.
